name: Dungeon of Don Juund
description:
You are a famous treasure hunter. When you heard rumors about an abandoned cave that once belonged to a pirate called Don Juund, you thought it was but an excuse for a pun. You went on with your life until you found evidences of the cave's existence! Delve through the many rooms of the labyrintic crypt, and find as much treasures as you can.

Concept : 

You need to find your way down in a maze-like dungeon full of treasures and traps. Bandits and wild animals lurk everywhere. Craft some gear to defend yourself, and try going as deep as possible.
